hadiths.text: It was narrated from Hamza bin 'Amr Al-Aslami that:he asked the Messenger of Allah about fasting while traveling. He said: "If," then he said something to the effect that: "If you want, then fast, and if you want, then do not fast

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى سُلَيْمَانَ بْنِ يَسَارٍ فِي حَدِيثِ حَمْزَةَ بْنِ عَمْرٍو فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mention of the different report from Sulaiman bin Yasar in the Narration of Hamzah bin 'Amr about that
